long_description: Perfect for easy-going paddles in warm weather, the Seals Splash Deck spray skirt helps keep harsh sunlight and water off your lap. The Seals Splash Deck fits snugly around your waist without excess fabric while seated in the cockpit; it's a great choice when you don't need a complete spray skirt. Medium-weight, coated nylon provides waterproof protection and high durability. Double-stitched construction with sealed seams ensures long-lasting wear and water resistance. Large mesh pocket offers simple storage right on your lap. Adjustable shockcord secures skirt firmly to cockpit coaming. Front webbing grab loop assists with entry and fast wet exits. Adjustable-tension deck stay bows skirt up, resisting pooling of water on top. Waist secures the fit with a soft elastic band.
short_description: Perfect for easy-going paddles in warm weather, the Seals Splash Deck spray skirt helps keep harsh sunlight and water off your lap.
